review: So far, so good with my unit. Lot's of negative reviews popping up out here since introduction.For those seeking the highest audio/video quality in home theater, go with a streaming device like this.Prior to these streaming devices, you had to use a blu-ray player to get true 1080P video resolution and 7.1 Dolby surround.Get 'em both when viewing movies and TV shows broadcasting such content. Another bonus for me is being able to play Amazon Prime music through my home theater.I can't believe the sheer volume of video and audio programming you can get for free if you are an Amazon Prime member.And for $39?  Buy it!
